pages.text: Log aap say qayamat kay baray mein sawal kertay hain. Aap keh dijiye! kay iss ka ilm to Allah hi ko hai aap ko kiya khabar boht mimkin hai qayamat bilkul hi qareeb ho
Allah Taalaa ney kafiron per laanat ki hai aur unn kay liye bharakti hui aag tayyar ker rakhi hai
Jiss mein woh humesha humesh rahen gay. Woh koi haami aur madadgar na payen gay
Uss din unn kay chehray aag mein ulat pulat kiye jayen gay (hasrat-o-afsos say) kahen gay kay kaash hum Allah Taalaa aur rasool ki itaat kertay
Aur kahen gay aey humaray rab! Hum ney apnay sardaron aur apnay baron ki mani jinhon ney humen raah-e-raast say bhatka diya
Perwerdigar tu enhen dugna azab dey aur inn per boht bari laanat nazil farma
Aey eman walo! Unn logon jaisay na bann jao jinhon ney musa ko takleef di pus jo baat unhon ney kahi thi Allah ney unhen uss say buri farma diya aur woh Allah ka nazdeek ba-izzat thay
Aey eman walon! Allah Taala say daro aur seedhi seedhi (sachi) baaten kiya kero
Takay Allah Taalaa tumharay kaam sanwaar day aur tumharay gunah moaaf farma dey aur jo bhi Allah aur uss kay rasool ki farma bardari keray ga uss ney bari murad paali

Hum ney apni amanat ko aasmano per zamin per aur paharon per paish kiya pus sab ney iss ko uthaney say inkar ker diya aur iss say darr gaye (magar) insan ney issay utha liya woh bara hi zalim jahil hai
(yeh iss liye) kay Allah Taalaa munafiq mardon aurton aur mushrik mardon aurton ko saza dey aur momin mardon aurton ki toba qabool farmaye aur Allah Taalaa bara hi bakhsney wala aur meharbaan hai
